short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use Capti Chrome extension for listening to documents, books, and web articles..

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Capti provides an innovative way to consume web content. With Capti, you can listen to web articles, format text to make it easier to read, and save content to Capti cloud. It's a versatile tool that can improve your productivity and make reading more enjoyable. Capti is perfect for various users such as busy professionals, students, teachers, retirees, and people with learning disabilities.

Capti aims to create a more inclusive environment for all learners, regardless of their abilities. It supports various disabilities such as vision loss, dyslexia, ADHD, motor impairments, and more. Capti is also available on iOS, which means you can access your content later from your mobile device. This feature is particularly useful for people who are always on the go.

Capti is developed with the help of National Science Foundation, National Institute of Health, and Department of Education.
